channel.title: Need a hoster $$/Position
channel.description: [b][size=36pt]Looking to be apart of a RSPS Community?[/size][/b] [size=24pt]Looks like your in luck![/size] [size=10pt]I am in need of a Reliable 24/7 Server Host Pre - Portforwarded Active throughout the week/weekend. . Once donations are up Payments will be setup torwards you. A custom title/Co-Owner spot will be available to you :) If you have these requirements Email me at Hazeyblunt49@yahoo.com or reply on here Thanks:P [/size] [size=24pt]Note:Anti feature implemented for my benefit [/size]

item.title: Need a hoster $$/Position
item.dc:creator: @cub374 cub374
item.description:
@cub374 wrote:

Hey there i could be a hoster for you, i have hosted 3-4 servers now and they all did pretty well but my 2nd ran off with everything so now I’m looking to get back in into it

Add me on Skype: tinglov56

thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Need a hoster $$/Position
item.dc:creator: @puretyler3 puretyler3
item.description:
@puretyler3 wrote:

[quote=“ford rock99, post:4, topic:506648”][quote author=puretyler3 link=topic=624884.msg4256154#msg4256154 date=1362799001]
Ive Ran multiple RsPs, Successfully Second, I have money Just not to start off with. I will guarantee 100% server hit with the donations at least. I appreciate your accident bump:D
[/quote]

was not an accident, i have ran my own private servers and to tell you the truth you really do need money to start it off i put $150 out my my own money into starting 1 of them and i made alot more back out of it you also need alot of spare time/nolife to keep them running hence the reason mine arnt up anymore. yet i ran mine for over 6 months.[/quote] I agree with you on the starting money,I just need to make some first in order for a friend to put in $300 for the vps/Vbulletin and ddos protections,I do have alot of freetime just moved to a new state and I dont have very many friends:P haha yea loner status.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a hoster $$/Position
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

puretyler3:

Ive Ran multiple RsPs, Successfully Second, I have money Just not to start off with. I will guarantee 100% server hit with the donations at least. I appreciate your accident bump:D

was not an accident, i have ran my own private servers and to tell you the truth you really do need money to start it off i put $150 out my my own money into starting 1 of them and i made alot more back out of it you also need alot of spare time/nolife to keep them running hence the reason mine arnt up anymore. yet i ran mine for over 6 months.

item.description:

i love when people post the hole,

“when donations are up you will be paid”

if you dont have money to start off a private server or you cant host yourself dont even bother with one, best advice i can give to you.
